name: Spinis
description:
New game from '100 Balls' creators.

'Spinis' is the unique puzzle game. Spin the wheel and group same-colored balls. Third same-colored ball will remove all same-colored balls in that slot and neighborhood slots. More balls will be removed more higher value balls will apear and more points will be added to your score. If you stuck you can use bonus buttons to remove coming ball, convert coming ball in to all-colored ball and free up one slot if you need additional space. It will cost you stars. Every game begins by transferring 10 stars from your bank to the game. Additional stars you will earn in the game. Remove 50 balls and get one of powerful balls. Beginning is easy - continuing hard or not. Find it yourself.

• Physics engine;
• 3D graphics;
• Easy control;
• Leaderboard;
• Sounds and music.
